BR_text.BRsummary: A typo in word embedding tutorial
BR_text.BRdescription:
In our word embedding <denchmark-link:https://gluon-nlp.mxnet.io/model_zoo/word_embeddings/index.html>tutorial</denchmark-link>
 , it looks like  should be .

comments_0.comment_text: And --max-vocab-size in run_all.sh should be --analogy-max-vocab-size. Do we have CI run on this tutorial?

comments_1.comment_text:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/junrushao1994>@junrushao1994</denchmark-link>
  thanks for finding them. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/leezu>@leezu</denchmark-link>
  would be interested. We run the python scripts but not the scripts or the command lines.
